tool.name: AttributeImageDetections

param.name: detectionFC
param.dialogReference: The polygon feature class containing bounding boxes or outlines of detections from an image.
param.pythonReference: The polygon feature class containing bounding boxes or outlines of detections from an image.

param.name: sourceImage
param.dialogReference: The image from which the detection feature class was created. The image chips will be created from this image.
param.pythonReference: The image from which the detection feature class was created. The image chips will be created from this image.

param.name: storeAsBlob
param.dialogReference: Optional parameters. If selected the image chips will be added to the detection feature class ONLY as a BLOB field in the attribute table.
param.pythonReference: Optional parameters. If selected the image chips will be added to the detection feature class ONLY as a BLOB field in the attribute table.

tool.summary: Add Image Chip to Detection is used to automatically create image chips of detections and append the chips into the detection feature class' attributes.
